sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 16, 2026 –

Bucks Run will be groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. The trails on the golf course have patches of grass with the melted snow.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Fresh groom this morning for the skate deck & classic tracks. Exceptional conditions!!!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Love the Valentine's Day Buck's Snow and the track to the parking. Like a sweet marshmallow.  Definitely worth five bucks. Winter returns next week.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Skied in the afternoon and found snow cover on golf course was much better than anticipated and most of the groomed tracks were still usable. Sunny areas were soft while shady areas were still moderately icy. Stayed out of the woods assuming trails would be an icy chopped up mess because of all the walkers. Golf course skiing should be reasonable for at least one more day.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Happy Presidents' Day! It is going to be a comfortable day to ski with the high temperature to reach just over 40 degrees. The Grooming Crew did a fantastic job last night and the snow surface is in great shape. As the temperature goes above freezing today expect the snow to get loose in the afternoon. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is Bavarian Chowder. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
